title: Sentinels Esports Club LF Coaches/Analysts for OCS preparation!
body:
http://i.imgur.com/yULRRnI.png[/img]
Hello everyone.
Sentinels Esports Club are currently seeking experienced coaching/analyst staff members!

> Current starting roster as of December 2015:
Mid: Player from KR (TBA)
Top: Player from KR (TBA)
Jungle: SoulStrikes
ADC: SNT Illusion
Support: NADA1001

 
Work Requirements:
- Working with a Challenger level team
- 3 - 5 Nights per week (2 - 5 hours per session)
- Be present in gaming house located in Sydney during OOL (highly preferred)
- Able to attend all scheduled games (competitive & practice)
 
Candidate must be/have:
- Fluent in English
- Platinum+ in 2015 Season (highly preferred)
- Previous experience with other teams
- Extensive knowledge on game play & meta game
- Able to fly to Sydney with a given 2 week notice
- A high level of commitment & dedication

The Perks:
- Paid salary upon **successfully qualifying** for OPL
- Covered flights and accommodation (living essentials for gaming house included)
 
 
 How to apply:
 Send us an email at SentinelsEsports@gmail.com in the layout below or send a written CV. We will get back to you ASAP.
 Additionally, add SNT Tangster & Siv480p for further discussion regarding the position.
 
 Name & Age:
 Country/City/State:
 Skype & IGN:
 Position you're applying for (e.g Life/Strategic Coach, Analyst):
 About yourself:
 Previous work with teams or players:
 Anything extra that you feel is relevant to the position:

 
 Feel free to leave any questions below.
 Good luck!

replies.body:
Hey mate joshua here im 18 yrs of age live in Sydney travel is pretty easy skype name Hi im rain or ign aydc position im trialing for is strat coach but can fill in an analytic position aswell about me been playing this game for ages been looking to step up my level with esports looking to give a team a opportunity to be able to go through further, iv coached many teams played in all positions for plat teams and above have extensive knowledge of the game 
if you like me then just hit me up on basically all the time

How to apply:
Send us an email at SentinelsEsports@gmail.com in the layout below or send a written CV. We will get back to you ASAP.
Additionally, add SNT Tangster & Siv480p for further discussion regarding the position.

Name & Age:
Country/City/State:
Skype & IGN:
Position you're applying for (e.g Life/Strategic Coach, Analyst):
About yourself:
Previous work with teams or players:
Anything extra that you feel is relevant to the position:



Simple instructions my friend.
- Able to fly to Sydney with a given 2 week notice, is that paid for or would i have to pay for it?
Out of curiosity, how is all of this being funded? You don't seem to have much of a foundation but claiming a gaming house, flights, etc.. Sounds too good to be true for such a young organisation.

Our staff have contributed to the upbringing of this organisation by investing their own time and funding.
We're young but hungry :)
